Text:
ugh... I hate this bigotted shit... it's annoying...

I have two friends who are Jewish, and they sure as hell don't go to meetings or control the world.

I listend to this openly racist codger give his schpeel and I think its funny how libertarians latch on to this lame rhetoric even when he says it himself: "zionism sold out" simple as that, big whoop... The folks you should be paranoid about aren't the zionists but the ones they sold out to, e.i. the market driven banks, they are the ones who also bought out the nazis.

anti-oedipus, 

please upload some content that refutes Benjamin Freedman.  Make a video, an audio file, or cite a book/essay we can consult.  Name calling is not productive.  Looking forward to your upload or reference.
